import React from 'react'; import styled from '@emotion/styled'; import {addCart} from '../../redux/index'; import {removeCart} from '../../redux/index'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { uuid } from 'uuidv4'; import "./sticks.css" const Item = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items:center; margin:70px; ` const SticksContainer = (props) => { return (
Sticks

); } const mapStateToProps=state=>{ return { numItems: state.cart } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch =>{ return{ addCart: itemObj=>dispatch(addCart(itemObj)), removeCart: itemId=>dispatch(removeCart(itemId)) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(SticksContainer)
